class.name: OpenXRIPBinding
class.brief_description: Defines a binding between an [OpenXRAction] and an XR input or output.
class.description: This binding resource binds an [OpenXRAction] to an input or output. As most controllers have left hand and right versions that are handled by the same interaction profile we can specify multiple bindings. For instance an action "Fire" could be bound to both "/user/hand/left/input/trigger" and "/user/hand/right/input/trigger". This would require two binding entries.

method.name: add_path
method.deprecated: Binding is for a single path.
method.description: Add an input/output path to this binding.

method.name: get_binding_modifier_count
method.description: Get the number of binding modifiers for this binding.

method.name: get_path_count
method.deprecated: Binding is for a single path.
method.description: Get the number of input/output paths in this binding.

method.name: has_path
method.deprecated: Binding is for a single path.
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this input/output path is part of this binding.

method.name: remove_path
method.deprecated: Binding is for a single path.
method.description: Removes this input/output path from this binding.

members.member: Binding path that defines the input or output bound to [member action]. [b]Note:[/b] Binding paths are suggestions, an XR runtime may choose to bind the action to a different input or output emulating this input or output.
Paths that define the inputs or outputs bound on the device.
